competitors.name: PandaDoc
competitors.notes: Document management platform with e-signature capabilities

context: In 2020, DocuSign dominated the e-signature market with significant market share boost during the COVID-19 pandemic as remote work accelerated digital transformation. The company saw explosive growth as businesses rapidly adopted electronic signatures. Main competitors included Adobe Sign (leveraging Adobe ecosystem), HelloSign (acquired by Dropbox 2019), and emerging players like PandaDoc. The pandemic created unprecedented demand for contactless document signing.
